document_data.name: Kaitlin's weed
document_data.mainbody: '''Kaitlin's weed''' was a plant found growing within the prairie lands surrounding the [[Hill of Lost Souls]], located slightly southwest of the southern border of the great desert [[Anauroch]].
document_data.Uses: Often confused with another weed called [[dragon's breath (weed)|dragon's breath]], which was poisonous, Kaitlin's weed was used as a natural balm treatment for common sunburn.<ref name="EE.AI-p17>
